page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content: WORK In over 30% of the families, both parents work either full or part-time;the latter is usually done by women.62% of the remainder have the man working, the others are made up of women only working or depending on social security. SHOPPING Facilities are reasonable within the block. Newton has a general store, a post office, an off-licence, a D.I.Y. a ladies' hairdresser, a repairing garage and a nursery produce shop.There is a produce shop on the A584 at Clifton Marsh Farm, Freckleton, but there are no shops at Lea within the block.All 5 public houses serve meals. THE AGED Elderly people are provided with a meals-on-wheels service 3 times weekly.The Over-60's meet fortnightly.
